20110123010333.000|20110123010334.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JOHN, GOOD         
20110123010334.000|20110123010334.000|CC1|AFTERNOON.                      
20110123010334.000|20110123010336.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC WORKS DEPARTMENT HAS 
20110123010336.000|20110123010338.000|CC1|WORKERS OUT LOOKING FOR PEOPLE

20110123010339.000|20110123010339.000|CC1|POLES.

20110123010347.000|20110123010351.000|CC1|WORKS CREW ON PATROL.
